summary: Lorna is a beautiful widow living all alone at her country chateau, with only her books and paintings for company. Then one day Triana, a wild gypsy girl who has been raised in an orphanage... See full summary »
cast: Patricia Granada|Lidia Zuazo|Rafael Machado|David Thomson|Montserrat Julió|Daisy Jules|Lea Candle|Claude Bellot|Patricia Lorne|Enrique Montserrat
title: La visita del vicio
